```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

Import the weather data

```{r}
data("weather_df")
```

Making our first plot :-)

```{r}
ggplot(weather_df, mapping = aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax))+
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggp_weather_scatterplot = 
  weather_df |>
    ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax))+
    geom_point()

ggp_weather_scatterplot
```

```{r}
weather_df |>
  filter(is.na(tmax))
```
